task.title: Mask Credit Card Numbers
task.shortdesc: Use the Field Masker to mask sensitive data, in this case, credit card numbers.

context.p: The Field Masker provides fixed and variable-length masks that mask all data. You can create a custom mask that contains masked positions and revealed positions. And you can use a regular expression mask that defines the string and optionally allows you to reveal one or more groups in the string.
For our pipeline, let's mask all but the last four digits of the credit card number with the following regular expression:(.*)([0-9]{4})
Notice the expression defines two groups so we can reveal the second group.

step.cmd: From the stage library, select the Field Masker processor and connect it to the previous stage.
With the processor selected, in the Properties panel, click the Mask tab.
